summary: Completed comprehensive testing of C7 Regime Clustering backend APIs. All 8 test requirements passed successfully. k-means clustering on 1357 historical state vectors with 6 clusters working correctly with deterministic results.

minor_issues.issue: C7 cluster endpoints not accessible via public URL (404 errors)
minor_issues.impact: Cluster APIs only work on localhost:8001, not via public ingress

passed_tests: 2020-03-14 returns RISK_OFF_STRESS with same cluster ID as GFC
Sum of cluster sizes (1357) equals nSnapshots
Two consecutive clustering runs produce identical results (determinism verified)
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor: Configure Kubernetes ingress to properly route /api/ae/cluster/* endpoints to backend service. Currently cluster endpoints only accessible via localhost, not public URL.
